title: Net sales share of Estée Lauder worldwide 2017 , by distribution channel
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net sales share for 8 number of Distribution channels.
Distribution channel Department stores has the highest Net sales share and Salon and spa has the lowest Net sales share.
The difference of Net sales share between the highest and lowest Distribution channel is 39.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net sales share for 8 number of Distribution channels.
The Net sales share is appeared to be the highest at Distribution channel Department stores and lowest at Distribution channel Salon and spa.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net sales share for 8 number of Distribution channels.
Distribution channel Department stores has the highest Net sales share and Salon and spa has the lowest Net sales share.
The difference of Net sales share between the highest and lowest Distribution channel is 39.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net sales share for 8 number of Distribution channels.
The maximum Net sales share 42.0 is found at Distribution channel Department stores and the minimum is found at Salon and spa where Distribution channel is 3.0.
Second maximum Net sales share is found at Distribution channel Travel retail.
The difference of Net sales share between the highest and lowest Distribution channel is 39.0.
The Distribution channel Department stores has the highest Net sales share, followed by Travel retail, and Specialty-multi. Down to the Distribution channel Salon and spa which is the lowest.
Distribution channel Freestanding retail stores, and Specialty-multi have a similar Net sales share that is 11.0.
The average Net sales share in all 8 Distribution channels is 12.5.
Summing up the values of all Distribution channels, we get total 100.0.
